original_text: Then it went west to Maralah, it touched Dabbesheth, and it went to the valley near Jokneam.
korean_text: 서쪽으로 올라가서 마랄라에 이르러 답베셋을 만나 욕느암 앞 시내를 만나고

sentences.original_text: Then it went west to Maralah
and it went to the valley near Jokneam
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 요그나암 근처의 골짜기로 갔습니다
